name: myft-api
desc: API for storing and retrieving a users personalisation and usage activity

name: personalised-feed-api
desc: Serves a personalised feed of content

name: config-vars
desc: Central repositority for prod, test and dev environment variables

name: service-registry
desc: Lists all the services in the Next stack

name: pagerduty
desc: Wakes up Matts when things go wrong

name: es-interface
desc: Pushes CAPI content in to an ElasticSearch index (deprecated)

name: content-notifier
desc: Polls content API for new content and sends notifications

name: myft-email-generator
desc: Creates and sends digest emails for myFT

name: brightcove-proxy-api
desc: Proxies requests for FT video's hosted on brightcove.com

name: ab
desc: API for segmenting users in to AB test buckets

name: ammit-docs
desc: Documentation for the next AB service

name: router-v2
desc: The old microservice router (deprecated and only used for the Heroku addons).

name: session
desc: Validates user sessions, and extracts information from the membership database.

name: preflight
desc: Rolls up all the APIs that we call from the CDN layer into one call - session service, Access API, barriers API and AB API.

name: myft-page
desc: A service that serves personalised content

name: clippings-proxy
desc: Handles journeys for old clippings users

name: errors
desc: A service that serves error pages

name: opt-in-template
desc: Opt-in link template as a service

name: assets
desc: Serves static assets needed by multiple next applications

name: hashed-assets
desc: Serves hashed js/css/maps needed by next applications from S3

name: tme-search-api
desc: tme search api, temporarily serving user facing search suggestions

name: ads-api
desc: API to get targeting info for advertising on Next

name: rtcl-email-api
desc: API to send article links by email.

name: flags-api
desc: API For toggling and editing feature flags

name: popular-api
desc: API For collecting and surfacing popular things

name: flags-ui
desc: Provides a UI for toggling and editing flags via the API

name: graphql-api
desc: GraphQL API to retrieve date for Next

name: em-dot-warn-page
desc: Warns people trying to opt out of Next

name: fastly-to-graphite
desc: Pulls data out of fastly and sends it to graphite
